articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets Special Envoy of First Secretary of CPC Central Committee
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets Special Envoy of First Secretary of CPC Central Committee
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on Thursday met Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba (CPC) and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, and his party on a visit to the DPRK as a special envoy of Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the C.C., CPC.
					 Kim Jong Un had a talk with them.
					
					 Welcoming them to the DPRK, he said their visit marks an important occasion in developing the relations between the two parties and two countries.
					
					 He noted he was sincerely pleased that the Seventh Congress of the CPC was successfully held and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz was reelected first secretary of the Central Committee of the CPC.
					
					 He said that as Comrade Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa informed the WPK in detail of the CPC Seventh Congress, the WPK came to know better about the issues to which the CPC attaches importance and the will of the Cuban party, government and people to invariably hold high the banner of the cause of socialism against imperialism.
					
					 Noting that the CPC Seventh Congress is of important significance in enhancing the leadership role of the party and advancing the socialist cause, he sent a militant salute and warm hug to the Cuban party and people in their struggle for building socialism in conformity with the actual conditions of Cuba.
					
					 The DPRK and Cuba are far away from each other geographically, but they are fighting in the same trench of the common struggle against imperialism, and the WPK, government and people of the DPRK are always standing by the side of the Cuban party, government and people, he said, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and two countries would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa conveyed the warm greetings of Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz to Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for having paid deep attention to the itinerary of their sojourn in the DPRK and spared his precious time to receive them though he was very busy leading the drive for building a socialist power.
					
					 He said that he deemed it as a great honor to personally convey the warm congratulations of Raul Castro Ruz to Kim Jong Un, the most creditable successor to the revolutionary cause of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, on his election as chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 Noting that the friendly relations between the two countries provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz have grown strong under the special care of Kim Jong Un and Raul Castro Ruz, he stressed that it is the steadfast policy of the party and government of Cuba to steadily develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the CPC once again reiterated the will of Cuba never to give up socialism but develop socialism in a sustainable manner and steadily boost the relations of solidarity with all countries including the DRPK which has traditionally and historically supported the Cuban revolution, he added.
					
					 At the talk the two sides informed each other of the important issues of mutual concern of the WPK and the CPC and the successes and experience gained in party activities and socialist construction in the two countries, had a sincere exchange of opinions on the international situation and shared views on all issues.
					
					 A gift from Raul Castro Ruz was presented to Kim Jong Un by Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa.
					
					 Kim Jong Un thanked for it and had a photo session with the special envoy and his party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC).
					 The message extended the warmest congratulations to Xi Jinping and, through him, to the Central Committee of the CPC and all party members and other Chinese people on the occasion of the 95th founding anniversary of the CPC.
					
					 The CPC led to victory the protracted struggle of the Chinese people against the imperialists and the reactionaries in the homeland to build new socialist China, the message said, adding:
					
					 Now the CPC is conducting a vigorous struggle to strengthen the party, keep social stability, achieve sustainable development of economy and build a comprehensively well-off society.
					
					 The message wished the Chinese people greater success in their efforts for building socialism with the Chinese characteristics and realizing prosperity of the Chinese nation under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					 We have willingness to develop together with the Chinese comrades the DPRK-China friendship with long historical roots as required by the new century and thus promote socialist construction in the two countries and defend peace and security in Northeast Asia, the message said.
					
					 It wished Xi Jinping good health and success in his responsible work and the People's Republic of China prosperity and the Chinese people happiness under the leadership of the CPC.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Reveals Park Geun Hye Group's Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Reveals Park Geun Hye Group's Human Rights Abuses 
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Friday made public the records of human rights abuses the Park Geun Hye group has committed by turning south Korea into the worst hell where all sorts of horrible crimes against the people and human ethics are perpetrated.
					 According to the records, Park Geun Hye who inherited fascist nature of the "yusin" dictator has resorted to such politically-motivated terrorism as arresting, imprisoning and eliminating whoever stands in the way of her dictatorial rule.
					
					 In 2013 the Park group arrested aged core members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification including its Vice-Chairman Ro Su Hui on the charge of violation of the "Security Law" and brutally imposed upon them ideological conversion. In October 2013 her group outlawed the Teachers Union, a typical progressive organization in the educational circle of south Korea after labeling it "organization following the north."
					
					 In December 2014, the Park group forcibly disbanded the Unified Progressive Party. This was the height of its politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 Freedom of speech and expression is wantonly violated in south Korea under the brutal tyrannical rule of the Park group.
					
					 The group of traitors deleted more than 23 790 articles from websites and forcibly shut down hundreds of websites on the charge of violation of the "Security Law" for eight months since its coming to power.
					
					 The puppet regime has mercilessly suppressed the protest actions of the south Korean people for their vital rights against the unpopular rule.
					
					 It filed a suit with the court against at least 190 railway unionists after branding the general strike of railway workers of south Korea demanding the withdrawal of policy for de-nationalization of railways and stop to the suppression of the trade unions as "illegal one", and dismissed more than 8 500 workers.
					
					 It hurled about 5 000 police gangsters into storming the headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, legitimate organization, and walked off more than 130.
					
					 Owing to the reckless "stimulating economy policy" of traitor Park, "state debt" of south Korea reached 1 170 billion U.S. dollars, an all-time high, and families' debt increased to 1 200 billion U.S. dollars or a jump of 30 percent over that three years ago.
					
					 In February this year the Park group shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, driving about 6 000 businesses of south Korea including 124 others ready to operate there into the mire of bankruptcy.
					
					 The Park group has turned south Korea into a veritable hell and mayhem.
					
					 A typical example was the ferry Sewol disaster which stunned the world in April, 2014.
					
					 The Park group's crimes found a vivid manifestation in the fact that MERS broke out in south Korea in May last year, plunging it into extreme uneasiness, horror and confusion. 
					
					 Owing to the Park group's irresponsible and careless measure, epidemics persisted for more than 200 days, infecting 186 persons and leaving 38 dead,  over 16 000 isolated. Even now people are seized with uneasiness and fear due to the continued spread of diseases for unknown reasons.
					
					 The number of cases of violence that occurred in families last year reached over 40 000 cases or more than double that in the previous year.
					
					 The Park group vociferated about the "elimination of gender discrimination", "nursing and upbringing of children free of charge" and "improvement of welfare" during the "presidential" election campaign and following its seizure of power, but this was no more than a mockery and hypocrisy against the people.
					
					 At present, the rate of the south Korean women's participation in economic activities recorded the lowest among countries and regions under the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development and the gap between both sexes in wages is 39 percent, more deplorable than that in developing countries.
					
					 The number of cases of maltreatment of children is on the yearly increase. It rose 27 times in 2014 as compared with that in 2010.
					
					 Discrimination against disabled persons and old persons has reached a serious phase.
					
					 The Park group has been well aware that the U.S. deliberately introduced germ weapons including anthrax and pest germs into its military bases in south Korea and conducted biochemical tests aimed to exterminate Koreans but it made no scruple of committing treacherous acts of conniving and patronizing them.
					
					 When it was disclosed last year that the U.S. forces in south Korea illegally introduced anthrax germs into south Korea, the Park group was busy evading responsibility for it, talking nonsense that it did not receive an advance notice from the U.S. forces side and behaved slavishly, imploring the U.S. forces side to take measures to prevent the recurrence of such accident.
					
					 The puppet regime made no scruple of nullifying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in a bid to cover up the "yusin" dictator's pro-Japanese acts.
					
					 It has committed countless human rights abuses and unethical crimes while escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north. This is clearly evidenced by the facts that the puppet group hurled the Intelligence Service, the Ministry of Unification, the Foreign Ministry, the "center for protecting inhabitants who defected from the north", "foundation to support inhabitants who defected from the north", "team for overseas cooperation of the national community" and other plot-breeding bodies under the mask of civilians into operations for luring and abducting inhabitants of the north and forcibly putting them in custody and imposing "defection" upon them. 
					
					 The true colors of the Park Geun Hye group as hideous human rights abusers were fully revealed by the fact that it lured and abducted over 10 women employees of the DPRK who worked abroad in April this year and is keeping them in custody under the absurd pretext of "free will."
					
					 What merits more serious attention in the unethical crimes of the Park group is that it has abused inviolable human rights for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north and for moves to do harm to them.
					
					 The group has persistently resorted to anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign with the backing of foreign forces, groundlessly pulling up the DPRK.
					
					 No sooner had she come to power than invited riff-raffs including those from the U.S. and Japan to Chongwadae at which she trumpeted about "human rights in the north" and implored them for "deep attention and positive cooperation", behaving in a coquettish manner.
					
					 She made desperate efforts to join other countries in the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 In March last she railroaded the "bill on human rights in the north" through the "National Assembly" though this anti-reunification evil bill failed to pass through it under the rule of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The desperate efforts of the Park group to hide the grim realities of south Korea and human rights abuses would only bring to light its true colors and precipitate its miserable doom, the records concluded.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Stirring up Atmosphere of Escalating "Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Stirring up Atmosphere of Escalating "Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Friday as regards the U.S. vicious moves to create an international atmosphere of escalating sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK:
					 The U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet group held a briefing on the enforcement of illegal sanctions against the DPRK at the UN office on June 30.
					
					 The briefing held by the U.S. together with its followers without any authorization of the UN Secretariat and the UN Security Council was a mean action unprecedented in the UN history and a mockery of the international community.
					
					 As the DPRK has already clarified more than once, the UNSC "resolutions on the anti-DPRK sanctions" are nothing but criminal documents from A to Z bereft of impartiality, legality and morality as they serve the sinister political purpose of a power and wantonly infringe upon the independence and vital rights of a sovereign state.
					
					 For this reason, though the U.S. left no means untried to stir up the atmosphere of sanctions by prodding some satellite states, many countries are turning their backs on this move and the UN Secretariat itself is shunning the explanation about the legal ground for "resolutions on the anti-DPRK sanctions".
					
					 As the illegal "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK cooked up by the U.S. at the UNSC proved unworkable, the latter put into force its unilateral harsh sanctions against the former. In the meantime, it is staging such despicable farce as egging Japan, south Korea and other vassal forces on to visit various countries in a bid to pressurize and appease them to sever normal economic and trade ties and even  diplomatic relations with the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite natural that this mean and disgusting behavior only invites international sarcasm.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they calculate any sanctions and pressure will work on the DPRK making a leaping advance on the principle of giving priority to self-development.
					
					 The ever-escalating U.S. nuclear threat and sanctions would prompt the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity.

articles.title: Nursery No. 122, Icon Sapling Producer of DPRK
articles.content:
Nursery No. 122, Icon Sapling Producer of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Nursery No. 122, run by the Korean People's Army, has turned into a model and standard sapling producer in the DPRK whose cultivation of saplings is put on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis.
					 The nursery consists of several greenhouses based on ultra-modern technology and outdoor cultivation grounds.
					
					 All devices of its greenhouses are automatically controlled to ensure environmental conditions favorable for sapling growth. And any operation there is conducted on a high-level automatic and mechanized basis.
					
					In the outdoor cultivation grounds there are automatic irrigation facilities and sunshade apparatuses for the cultivation of potted saplings.
					
					 The nursery has an integrated control system and all its production processes ranging from seed selection to sowing and sapling packing are highly automated and streamlined.

articles.title: Youth and Students of Pyongyang Meet Ethiopian Youth Delegation
articles.content:
Youth and Students of Pyongyang Meet Ethiopian Youth Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- There took place at the Central Youth Hall on Friday a gathering of youth and students of Pyongyang and members of a delegation of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia.
					 Present there were Mun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the youth league, and other officials and youth and students in the city and members of the delegation led by President Gelta Ermiyas Mathewos.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.

articles.title: Concert Marks Birthday of Famous Composer
articles.content:
Concert Marks Birthday of Famous Composer
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A concert was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater to mark the 100th birthday of composer Kim Ok Song.
					 Kim, who could take the genuine road of artistic creation only when he came to the embrace of President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country, worked to compose revolutionary music till the last moments of his life, true to the Juche-base idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on literature and arts.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made sure that a concert was given to mark the 100th birthday of Kim Ok Song, praising the feats he performed by composing so many famous songs representing the times loved by the people.
					
					 Officials, creators, artistes, journalists and editors in the fields of literature and arts and media, teachers and students in the field of arts education and bereaved families watched the concert.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches here and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were music composed by People's Artist Kim Ok Song.
					
					 Among them are female duet and female chorus "Song of Mangyongdae", piano concerto "To a Decisive Battle", tenor trio "My Song in the Trench" and soprano solo "Kangson Is Hometown of Chollima." They were applauded by the audience.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Crewmen
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Foreign Crewmen
 Nampho, July 1 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen to remember President Kim Il Sung at Nampho Port on Friday with the approach of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of Panama-flagged ships KAIXIANG and ZHONGYU 57.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Il Sung led the two revolutionary wars to victory and saved the destiny of the Korean people from the colonial slavery and protected their motherland.
					
					 The great exploits he performed in the struggle for accomplishing the cause of human independence and protecting world peace and stability will shine forever, they said, adding:
					
					 The immortal Juche idea fathered by him is shedding brilliant rays as a beacon of hope for the world progressives. The Korean people are advancing under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea despite the arbitrary practices and sanctions of the imperialists.
					
					 They expressed belief that the future of the DPRK will be rosier thanks to the tested guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Preliminaries of 2016 ITTF World Tour Ends in DPRK
articles.content:
Preliminaries of 2016 ITTF World Tour Ends in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The 2016 ITTF World Tour Pyongyang Open, started on June 29, is going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Preliminaries of senior and U-21 men's and women's singles came to an end on June 30.
					
					 Pak Sin Hyok, Choe Il, Kang Wi Hun, Ro Kwang Jin, An Ji Song, Ri Kyong Hun, Kim Song Gun, Kim Hyong Jin and Ro Hyon Song from the DPRK, Ismailov Sadi from Russia and Xu Haidong, Cao Wei, Yu Heyi, Xu Yingbin, Yang Shuo and Zhao Zhaoyan from China will advance to the 16 tournament of senior men's singles and Ri Myong Sun, Ri Mi Gyong, Kim Hye Song, Cha Hyo Sim, Jong Un Ju, Kim Nam Hae, Kim Sol Song, Ri Hyon Sim, Yu Yong Sun and Kim Song I from the DPRK, Qian Tianyi, Mu Jingyu, Guo Yuhan, Fan Siqi, Shi Xunyao and Liu Weishan from China to that of senior women's singles.
					
					 Meanwhile, only DPRK paddlers are to take part in the top 8 tournament of U-21 men's and women's singles.

articles.title: DPRK Gymnasts Prove Successful at International Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Gymnasts Prove Successful at International Tournament
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK gymnasts returned home on Thursday after taking part in the International Tournament (Irtyshskiye Zori-2016).
					 The tournament held in Kazakhstan from June 25 to 27 brought together more than 450 men and women players from the DPRK, Russia, Uzbekistan and other countries. 
					
					 The DPRK players bagged two gold medals and a bronze medal in the trampoline event.
					
					 Kim Ju Hyang and Kim Yun Song respectively came first in the senior women's individual event and in the junior 13-15 men's individual event.
					
					 Kim Hyon A placed third in the junior age group 11-12 women's individual event.

articles.title: U.S. War Crimes Condemned by Int'l Bodies
articles.content:
U.S. War Crimes Condemned by Int'l Bodies
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists perpetrated brutal atrocities against the Korean people in the 1950-1953 Korean War.
					 Their hideous crimes were verified and condemned by a number of international fact-finding groups at that time.
					
					 A fact-finding team of the Women's International Democratic Federation, which consisted of delegates from 17 countries, said in its report in May 1951:
					
					 The mass killings and tortures committed by the U.S. troops in their temporarily occupied areas are more horrible than what the Nazis did in Europe. 
					
					 Each fact shows that the Korean War is for destroying civilian houses, damaging grains and killing women and old persons rather than military objects, war supplies and combatants.
					
					 A fact-finding team of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers said in a joint communique it announced in March 1952 after investigating the cruel massacres by the U.S. imperialist butchers in Sinchon County of the DPRK: We affirm that the happening in Korea is a crime rather than a war and the action by the U.S. imperialists is criminal both in terms of scheme and practice.
					
					 In May 2002, an international fact-finding group toured different areas of south Korea's North and South Kyongsang and South Jolla provinces to investigate the GIs' wartime crimes.
					
					 The group stated that the U.S. is an international criminal as its troops violated the 1949 Geneva Conventions in the Korean War and that the war was conducted for the American interests.
					
					 The records of history clearly show that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Future Is Bright: Leading Newspapers
articles.content:
DPRK's Future Is Bright: Leading Newspapers 
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK held here on June 29 elected the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK. 
					 DPRK's leading papers Friday in editorials say that holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the top post of the DPRK is a great honor and national auspicious event of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and a historic event in carrying forward to the last the cause of the Juche revolution that started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Nearly five years have passed since the service personnel and people of the DPRK entered the new century of Juche after overcoming bitter grief, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 These days saw the full demonstration of the personality of Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man over the world and cementing of the blood ties between him and the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Under his leadership, the party, state and army of the DPRK have developed into the glorious party, state and army of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and the single-minded unity, mainstay of the Korean revolution, has been consolidated in every way and the DPRK demonstrated its might as an invincible and matchless political and military power and youth power without an equal in the world.
					
					 Kim Jong Un glorified the DPRK as the Juche-oriented space power and independent nuclear power and ushered in the Mallima era undergoing changes day and night on this land. The service personnel and people of the DPRK are seeing the bright tomorrow of the great Paektusan nation which will leap towards a socialist economic power and highly civilized power in his distinguished practical ability.
					
					 Minju Joson says that it is the steadfast will of all the service personnel and other people of the DPRK to accelerate the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and the socialist cause holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the top post of the DPRK, and their revolutionary spirit is sky-high and the future of the DPRK is rosy as they are led by him.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers' Anti-"Government" Struggle Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers' Anti-"Government" Struggle Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The anti-"government" actions staged by the workers in south Korea are an inevitable protest and due condemnation against the misrule and oppression by the conservative authorities, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The present chief executive of south Korea made honeyed words during the "presidential election" that she would make "the world where the workers lead a happy life" in a bid to seize power but since she took office, she has pursued only the unpopular rule deteriorating the people's livelihood while bringing profits to the plutocrats, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "system of paying salaries according piece rate" pushed forward by the south Korean authorities is a product of such treacherous policy.
					
					 The system is, indeed, a horrible trap of death for the south Korean workers as it allows businesses to set the "targets for achievements" unilaterally and cut wages of workers and dismiss them at random by branding them as "those with poor piece rate" when they do not reach the level.
					
					 Due to the system, the number of the unemployed in south Korea that exceeded more than 4.5 million is snowballing and the destiny of many workers and their families is being driven into cliff.
					
					 It is too natural that the south Korean workers are now rising up in the general strike, denouncing the "targets for achievement" as "the reversed layoff level", and the "system for salaries according piece rate" as the "system of forcible retirement" and the "modern-version slave system."
					
					 The dictatorial rule is bound to ruin as it stamps out even the elementary vital rights of the popular masses and arrests social progress and democratic development.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Escape Its Responsibility for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Escape Its Responsibility for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the U.S. Department of Defense recently blustered that U.S. is closely following the situation on the Korean peninsula together with its allies in the region and that north Korea should refrain from its provocations ratcheting up the tension.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 No matter what rhetoric and invectives the U.S. may reel off against the DPRK, it can never evade its responsibility for escalating the tension on the peninsula.
					
					 However hard U.S. works to divert the world's criticism of it to the DPRK by misrepresenting the reality, it can never succeed.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the U.S. in ceaselessly introducing its strategic assets such as nuclear-powered  submarine  Mississippi carrying nuclear bombs and B-52H strategic bombers into south Korea is to steadily escalate the tension on the peninsula and unleash the second Korean war any moment.
					
					 It is an inviolable independent right of every country and nation to defend the sovereignty and dignity of a country and the lives and security and happiness of its people from the constant nuclear threat and blackmail and war moves of the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently threatens the DPRK with nuclear strike means, escalating tension on the peninsula, the latter will be left with no option but to steadily bolster up powerful preemptive offensive nuclear capability which may pose a constant threat to the U.S.

articles.title: Demo Staged in S. Korea in Demand of Nullification of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Demo Staged in S. Korea in Demand of Nullification of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The "national action for the nullification of the south Korea-Japan agreement on the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army and its just settlement" in south Korea staged a demonstration near Chongwadae in Seoul on June 28, demanding the nullification of the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Kil Won Ok and Kim Pok Dong, victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the co-representative of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and other people staged a demonstration, holding placards "No one billion yen! The Japanese government should make an official apology and legal reparation!"
					
					 Earlier, the national action held a press conference outside the building of the puppet National Assembly and conducted a campaign for writing letters demanding the nullification of the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery and renegotiations.

articles.title: S. Korean Businessmen Demand Regime to Pay Compensation for Shutting down KIZ
articles.content:
S. Korean Businessmen Demand Regime to Pay Compensation for Shutting down KIZ 
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) --At least 200 representatives of businesses involved in the closed Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) held a meeting in front of the puppet government building in Seoul on June 28 at which they demanded the regime pay compensation for the losses caused by its shutdown of the KIZ.
					 They declared in their appeal to the people that the Park Geun Hye regime is entirely to blame for the shutdown, demanding the regime duly compensate for the losses.
					
					 The regime is letting media advertise it is giving huge benefits to the businesses but this is too little for those businesses which can hardly think of making up for the losses, they deplored.
					
					 They vowed to carry on their rally till the regime restarts the KIZ and compensates for the losses suffered by the businesses.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Checking Inter-Korean Exchange
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Checking Inter-Korean Exchange 
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean website newspaper Tongil News, the Labor Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on June 28 accusing the puppet authorities of checking exchange and cooperation between the north and the south.
					 The statement denounced the Ministry of Unification for disallowing again on June 27 the exchange of letters between the headquarters and the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea for holding the football match between workers of the south and north for reunification. 
					
					 Noting that the inter-Korean relations have already been put at the lowest ebb, the statement charged that it is an action hardly understandable to check even the non-governmental exchange and cooperation aimed at mending the relations.
					
					 It urged the "government" to have a correct perception of non-governmental exchange and cooperation for reconciliation between the south and the north.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Colombo on June 27 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The chairman of the Gampaha Branch of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange a seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and other events.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uganda
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed at the Presidency of Uganda on June 24.
					 Henri Masico, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and department director of the Presidency of Uganda, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse events with the approach of July 8, the anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Sofia, Bulgaria on June 23.
					 Mincho Minchev, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party and chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize several events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Iran
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated by the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran on June 26.
					 A vice-general secretary in charge of international affairs of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Lawyers Meeting Supports Korean People's Cause
articles.content:
Lawyers Meeting Supports Korean People's Cause
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 6th meeting of lawyers in Asia-Pacific region supported the just cause of the Korean people. The meeting was held in Katmandu from June 17 to 19.
					 The executive secretary of the World Peace Council in a speech extended solidarity to the Korean people who are struggling for the country's reunification against the aggression by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 A vice-director of the Supreme Public Prosecutors Office of Bangladesh said the world peace-loving people should support the Korean people who single-handedly struggle against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The secretary general of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers said the Korean nation has suffered from its division for over seven decades, adding Korea's reunification should be achieved by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 The Katmandu declaration adopted at the meeting expressed support and solidarity with the cause of the Korean people for national reunification, supporting the peaceful reunification of Korea by the concerted efforts of the nation.

articles.title: Month of Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
articles.content:
Month of Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of opening the month of solidarity with the Korean people took place in Havana on June 24.
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said in a speech that he did not forget the hard-fought Korean War ignited by the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK on June 25, 1950.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers gave full play to their disposition as brutal murderers in the war against the Korean people.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists yielded to the service personnel and people of the DPRK who turned out in the struggle for defending their country, united close around the party and the leader.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, dedicated their all to Korea's reunification till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Korea will be certainly reunified thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the great leaders.
					
					 Firm is the friendship between the two countries provided and developed by Comrades Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz, Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and being developed by Comrade Raul Castro Ruz and Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will always extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					 Then, the Korean films "Who drew the 38th parallel?" and "Chieftain of the Korean War" were shown.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Venezuela
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting with Korean People Held in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Venezuela on June 22 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the Yaracuy State government and assembly, the United Left Party, trade unions and social organizations and other people of Venezuela.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Venezuela and members of his embassy.
					
					 A secretary in charge of culture of the Yaracuy State government in a speech extended support and solidarity to the Korean people who are waging a dynamic struggle to oppose the U.S. imperialists and build a socialist power, and expressed the will to conduct the solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people's cause in various forms and ways.
					
					 The speaker of the state assembly said that the struggle of the Korean people who have firmly defended socialism while smashing every move of the U.S. imperialists for aggression and interference under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il serves as a good model for the Venezuelan people.
					
					 The general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party expressed belief that the Venezuelan people and the Korean people would support and solidarize with each other in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists, the common enemy, and for building of socialism.
					
					 The participants in the meeting expressed their will to conduct dynamic solidarity activities to support the Korean people in their struggle for building a socialist power, achieving the country's reunification and smashing the U.S. imperialists' provocation and moves for aggression during the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 At the end of the meeting Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Personage
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Il Sung is the most outstanding leader, peerlessly great man and great sage of humankind representing the 20th century.
					 Chernih, secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said this at an inaugural ceremony of the Nakhodka City Committee of Russia for Remembering President Kim Il Sung held on June 24.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Voices praising and revering at the President's feats and noble traits can be heard from the world progressives.
					
					 His revolutionary life would be remembered by people with deep emotion with the approach of July 8, the anniversary of his demise, as he performed undying exploits before history and humankind through his outstanding ideology and theory and sweeping revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A Nakhodka City Committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Russia on June 24.
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to recollect the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Abuja on June 24.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, former deputy president of the Senate and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee agreed to introduce the revolutionary exploits and career of President Kim Il Sung and achievements the Korean people made in defending the sovereignty of the country and building a socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and organize a remembrance meeting, film show and other events on the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se reune con enviado especial de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se reune con enviado especial de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio el 30 de junio a Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, de visita en Corea en calidad de enviado especial del Primer Secretario del CC del PCC, Raul Castro Ruz, y su comitiva.
					Kim Jong Un sostuvo conversaciones con los huespedes.
					
					Dando calida bienvenida al enviado especial y sus acompanantes, apunto que la visita de ellos marca un hito importante para el desarrollo de relaciones entre los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Dijo que esta complacido sinceramente por la celebracion exitosa del VII Congreso del PCC y la reeleccion de Raul Castro Ruz como Primer Secretario del CC del PCC.
					
					Ya que Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa informo detalladamente al PTC como transcurrio el VII Congreso del PCC, pudimos conocer mejor los problemas apreciados por el PCC y la voluntad del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba de seguir marchando bajo la bandera de la causa socialista antiimperialista, senalo.
					
					El VII Congreso del PCC tiene gran importancia para fortalecer el papel directivo del PCC e impulsar la causa socialista, expreso y envio el saludo combativo y abrazo fuerte al partido y pueblo cubanos que luchan por construir el socialismo conforme a las condiciones reales de su pais.
					
					Corea y Cuba estan luchando en la misma trinchera de la lucha conjunta contra el imperialismo aunque estan alejadas geograficamente y el PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea estan siempre al lado del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba, enfatizo y manifesto la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa transmitio el saludo cordial enviado por Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz al Maximo Dirigente del pueblo coreano.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a Kim Jong Un por haber prestado profunda atencion al programa de estancia de los visitantes y haberles recibido aunque esta muy ocupado por dirigir al frente la lucha por construir una potencia socialista.
					
					Dijo que el tiene gran honor de transmitir las calidas felicitaciones que envia Raul Castro Ruz por la eleccion de Kim Jong Un, quien continua perfectamente la causa revolucionaria de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, grandes Lideres del pueblo coreano, como Presidente del PTC en el VII Congreso de esta organizacion.
					
					Continuo que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, preparadas por Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il junto con Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz se consolidan y se desarrollan bajo la atencion especial de Kim Jong Un y Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					Reitero la firme orientacion del partido y gobierno cubanos de fortalecer y desarrollar continuamente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Cuba-Corea.
					
					Recordo que en el VII Congreso del PCC se ha ratificado la voluntad de Cuba de no renunciar jamas el socialismo, desarrollarlo sostenidamente y continuar desarrollando las relaciones solidarias con la RPDC y otros paises que han venido apoyando tradicional e historicamente la Revolucion Cubana.
					
					En la ocasion fueron informados mutuamente los problemas importantes de interes comun para el PTC y el PCC, los exitos y experiencias logrados en las actividades partidistas y la construccion socialista de los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Se intercambiaron con sinceridad las opiniones sobre la situacion internacional y se ha llegado a la conformidad en todos los problemas abordados.
					
					El enviado especial entrego a Kim Jong Un presente enviado por Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					El expreso agradecimiento por el respecto y se fotografio junto con el enviado especial y su comitiva.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 1 de julio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el 30 de junio un mensaje de felicitacion al Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Xi Jinping.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 95o aniversario de la fundacion del PCCh, hago llegar a Vd. y por su conducto mis calidas felicitaciones al CC del PCCh, a todos los militantes de vuestro partido y al pueblo chino.
					
					Durante un largo tiempo, el PCCh condujo a la victoria la lucha del pueblo chino contra los imperialistas y los reaccionarios internos y construyo la nueva China socialista.
					
					Hoy en dia, el PCCh libra una intensa lucha por fortalecer sus filas, mantener la estabilidad social, lograr el desarrollo sostenido de la economia y construir generalmente una sociedad basicamente acomodada.
					
					Deseo que bajo la direccion del PCCh, el pueblo chino logre mayores exitos en la lucha por construir el socialismo con peculiaridades chinas y traer la prosperidad de la nacion china.
					
					Estamos dispuestos a impulsar la construccion del socialismo en los dos paises y defender la paz y seguridad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico, al desarrollar junto con los companers chinos la amistad Corea-China de larga raiz historica conforme a las demandas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Formulo votos por la salud de Vd. y exitos en sus responsabilidades y por la prosperidad de la Republica Popular China y la felicidad del pueblo chino bajo la direccion del PCCh.

articles.title: IRP revela crimenes anti-DDHH y antietico de Paek Geun-hye
articles.content:
IRP revela crimenes anti-DDHH y antietico de Paek Geun-hye
Pyongyang, primero de julio (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia primero una nota de crimenes anti-DDHH que revela la faz verdadera de la banda de Park Geun-hye que cometiendo uno tras otro los crimenes antipopulares y antieticos, convirtio al Sur de Corea en un infierno mas cruel.
					Segun ella, Park Geun-hye quien heredo tal como es el caracter fascista del dictador de Yusin, se valio del terrorismo politico deteniendo, encarcelando y eliminando sin piedad a todas personas que obstaculizan su dominacion dictatorial.
					
					En 2013, la banda de Park detuvo, en virtud de la "ley de seguridad", a Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y otros miembros importantes con edades avanzadas y les impuso la abjuracion ideologia. En octubre del mismo ano, arrebato a fuerza la posicion legal del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, entidad progresista que representa el circulo de educacion  del Sur de Corea, calificandola de "entidad pro-Norte".
					
					El terrorismo politico de Park llego a climax descomponiendo en diciembre de 2014 el Partido Progresista Unido.
					
					Debido a la dominacion represiva de la banda de Park en el Sur de Corea es violada y pisoteada cruelmente la libertad de la publicacion y expresion.
					
					Durante 8 meses despues de toma del poder, la horda traidora borro en el sitio web de Internet en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" mas de 23 mil 790 articulos y cerro cientos de sitio web.
					
					Reprimio sin piedad la lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos contra la maligna politica antipopular de las autoridades titeres y por la defensa del derecho a vivir.
					
					Tildando de "ilegal" la huelga general de los obreros del ferrocarril que exigian la cancelacion de la medida de privatizacion del ferrocarril, el cese de represion al sindicato y otros, la banda titere acuso a mas de 190 miembros del  sindicato ferroviario y despidio a mas de 8 mil 500 obreros.
					
					Movilizo a 5 mil policias titeres para asaltar la sede de la legitima Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos y arrestaron a mas de 130.
					
					Debido a la imprudente "politica expansionista" de la traidora Park, la actual "deuda estatal" del Sur de Corea llego a un billon 170 mil millones de dolares y la deuda familia, a un billon 200 mil millones, cifra 30% mas crecida al comparar con la de 2013.
					
					Por el cierre de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, tomado en febrero del ano presente por la banda de Park, mas de 6 mil empresas estan en visperas de la crisis de quiebra.
					
					La horda de Park convirtio al Sur de Corea en un infierno humano y un pandemonium.
					
					Buen ejemplo de ello es el hundimiento del ferry "Sewol" que dejo consternado a todo el mundo en abril de 2014.
					
					Otro ejemplo es el incidente de transmision de MERS que en mayo del ano pasado, habia desatado inquietud, panico y desorden en la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Debido al control irresponsable e inactivo de la camarilla de Park, el incidente duro mas de 200 dias dejando como saldo 186 personas contagiadas, 38 muertas y mas de 16 mil apartadas. Ahora tambien se difunden las enfermedades brotadas por causas desconocidas poniendo a la poblacion inquietada y atemorizada.
					
					Los casos de violencia hogarena se totalizan el ano pasado en mas de 40 mil, el doble en comparacion con el ano anterior.
					
					Durante la campana de elecciones presidenciales, los compinches de Park prometieron la "eliminacion de discriminacion de la mujer", la "crianza gratuita de ninos" y la "ampliacion de bienestar". Pero esto fue una burla y engano a la opinion publica.
					
					Actualmente, el porcentaje de la participacion de las mujeres surcoreanas en las actividades economicas es mas bajo entre los paises y regiones pertenecientes a la Organizacion para la Cooperacion y Desarrollo Economicos (OCED), y ellas reciben salarios 39% menores que los hombres, peor situacion que los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Los casos de maltratos en la "Casa de Ninos" se incrementaron cada ano llegando en 2014 a 27 veces mas en comparacion con 2010.
					
					Es mas grave la discriminacion a los discapacitados y ancianos.
					
					La banda de Park tolera y ampara el hecho de que Estados Unidos introduce en sus bases en suelo surcoreano las armas biologicas como antracosis y peste y realiza las pruebas bioquimicas para exterminar a todos los coreanos.
					
					El ano pasado, cuando fue revelada la verdad de que las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea introdujeron por via ilegal los bacilos de antracosis, las autoridades surcoreanas trataron de eludir la responsabilidad diciendo que no han recibido ningun aviso previo desde la parte norteamericana. Se limito a pedir con bajeza a la parte del ejercito norteamericano que prestara atencion para evitar la repeticion del accidente.
					
					Para disimular los actos projaponeses y vendepatrias cometidos por el dictador de "Yusin", no vacilo en hacer nulo hasta el caso de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones.
					
					Insatisfecha de haber convertido el Sur de Corea en la tierra privada de derechos humanos, cometio incontables crimenes anti-DDHH y de lesa humanidad contra la parte connacional recurriendo a la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Instigo al Servicio de Inteligencia, el Ministerio de Unificacion, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y a las entidades de conspiracion disfrazadas de civiles como el "Centro de Norcoreanos Desertados", el "Fondo de Apoyo a Norcoreanos Desertados" y el "Equipo de Cooperacion en Ultramar de la Comunidad Nacional" a seducir, secuestrar y retener por la fuerza a los norcoreanos y obligarles la "sumision".
					
					Cometio en abril de este ano el rapto colectivo a mas de 10 norcoreanas, quienes trabajaban en el extranjero, y las retiene por la fuerza bajo el pretexto de "voluntad libre".
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto esta en que los compinches de Park abusan de los sagrados derechos humanos en sus fines de confrontacion fratricida y calumnia.
					
					Acusan absurdamente a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras en el tema de "DDHH".
					
					Tan pronto como llegara al poder, Park invito a Chongwadae a una gentuza, incluso los norteamericanos y japoneses, y les suplico la "atencion y cooperacion activas" en la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC. Por otra parte, realizo una gira por paises extranjeros tratando de dar dimension internacional a esa campana intrigante.
					
					En marzo de este ano, aprobo por la fuerza en la Asamblea Nacional la "ley de DDHH del Norte" que no obtuvo luz verde ni durante el mandato del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Cada vez que se tornen mas desesperadas las tentativas de Park y sus compinches de ocultar la realidad tragica del Sur de Corea, convertido en peor infierno del mundo para derechos humanos, y disimular sus crimenes anti-DDHH, se vera con mas claridad la fachada asquerosa de ellos y se les llegara mas rapido el fin tragico.
